comments:
- mark a .aj resource in the package explorer
- hit CTRL+C
- mark a target package
- hit CTRL+V
-> exception

Addition: Strangely that only happens when the .aj resource is currently opened 
in the AspectJ editor.

pointcutDiff plugin.

Fixed for 1.2.0RC2. You can now copy and paste .aj files.
